trans-unit.source: Defines the methods necessary to inspect or modify the creation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects when required.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法來檢查或修改建立必要<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件時所需。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: To inspect or modify <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects when they are created, implement the IInstanceContextInitializer interface and use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior> to add it to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.InstanceContextInitializers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查或修改<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>時建立的物件會實作 IInstanceContextInitializer 介面，並使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>將它加入至<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.InstanceContextInitializers%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.InstanceContextInitializers%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: There can be any number of context initializers for a service.
trans-unit.target: 可以有任意數目的服務內容初始設定式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the IInstanceContextInitializer is added to attach an extension to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object as a mechanism for passing data throughout an application.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，加入 IInstanceContextInitializer 來附加延伸到<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件做為整個應用程式中傳遞資料的機制。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If you want to participate in providing or selecting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that processes a message, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要參與提供或選取的<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件，可處理訊息，請參閱<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to modify the newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
The Initialize method is called when an <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>建立物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Typically this method is used to attach an extension so that custom data can be accessed throughout an application.
trans-unit.target: 通常這個方法用來附加延伸，以便自訂資料可存取整個應用程式。
系統提供的執行個體內容。

trans-unit.source: The message that triggered the creation of the instance context.
trans-unit.target: 觸發建立的執行個體內容的訊息。
